bibliographic-data.invention-title: NACHBEARBEITUNG VON ERWEITERUNGEN FÜR EINE SIGNALVERSTÄRKUNG
POST-TRAITEMENT DES GAINS POUR L'AMÉLIORATION DU SIGNAL

address.address-1: c/o Dolby Laboratories International Services (Beijing) Co. Ltd. World Financial Centre No.1 East 3rd Ring Middle Road Chaoyang District
c/o Dolby Australia Pty Limited Level 3 35 Mitchell Street

addressbook.name: Dolby International AB Patent Group Europe

abstract.p: A method, an apparatus, and logic to post-process raw gains determined by input processing to generate post-processed gains, comprising using one or both of delta gain smoothing and decision-directed gain smoothing. The delta gain smoothing comprises applying a smoothing filter to the raw gain with a smoothing factor that depends on the gain delta: the absolute value of the difference between the raw gain for the current frame and the post-processed gain for a previous frame. The decision-directed gain smoothing comprises converting the raw gain to a signal-to-noise ratio, applying a smoothing filter with a smoothing factor to the signal-to-noise ratio to calculate a smoothed signal-to-noise ratio, and converting the smoothed signal-to-noise ratio to determine the second smoothed gain, with smoothing factor possibly dependent on the gain delta.
